item.title: Trucker Kenworth T800 1.51 ETS2
item.description:
Trucker Kenworth T800 1.51 ETS2

4×2 Normal and LL Chassis
EcoTorq 12.7L Engine
500 PS engine, 2500 Nm torq
ZF 12TX2620 Gearbox
Changeable Front Grill (Black or White)
600L Main Fuel Tank + 450L Extra Fuel Tank (Optional)
GPS Navigation



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: BRSP Balkan Really Skin Pack for Schwarzmüller Refrigerated v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
BRSP Balkan Really Skin Pack for Schwarzmüller Refrigerated v1.0 ETS2

BRSP Schwarzmüller Refrigerated Edit
DLC REQUEST: SCHWARZMÜLLER

This mod have than 100 skin of most famous brand and company from Balkan:
Croatia, Slovenia, Serbia, Bosnia and Erzegovina, Macedonia, Montenegro and Kosovo

Adria Air, Air Serbia, Alkaloid, Alpesko Mleko, Apatinska Pivara x2, Argeta, Badel, Banjalučka Pivara, Barcaffè, Belje, Bingo, Croatia Airlines, Dana, Delamaris, Dijamant, DM, Don Market, Dukat, Elan, Eps ,Esm, Eurospin x2, Feršped, Frikom, Fructal, Gavirlović x2, HDL, Hemofarm AD, Hofer, Idea, Imlek, Jamnica, Jana, Jaffa, Jelen, Kam, Karlovačko, Kaufland, Klemen Transport x2, Knjaz Miloš, Konzum, Kraš, Laško, Lav, Ledo, Lek, Lidl, Marbo, Marko Usluge, Matthey Johnoson, Maxi, MB Pivo, Mepso, Mercator, Mlinotest, Montenegro Airlines, Nectar, Nikšičko Pivo, NTL, Orbico, Osiječko Pivo, Ožujsko Pivo, Pan Pek, Pekabeta Perutnina Ptuj, Perutnina Ptuj Poli, Pionir, Pik, Pišek, Pivara Tuzla, Plantaže, Pliva, Plodine, Podgoričko Pivo, Podravka, Radenska, Ralu Logistika, Ricardo, Roda, Sarajevsko Pivo, Šipad, Štark, Studenac Market, Swissilon, Tempo,Tommy, Trgovina Krk, Tuš, Union Pivovarna, Univexport, Valjevsko Pivo, Vego, Vindija, Viva Fresh Market, Voli, Zajecarsko Pivo, Žito Vardar x2, Zvijezda

item.title: ALEXD Lighting & Dashboard Enhancements v1.0 ETS2
item.description:
ALEXD Lighting & Dashboard Enhancements v1.0 ETS2

ALEXD Lighting & Dashboard Enhancements brings an improved driving experience to Euro Truck Simulator 2, specifically for DAF 2021, MAN TGX 2020, SCANIA R 2016, SCANIA S 2016, and VOLVO FH16 2012. This mod adds custom LED headlights, realistic headlight colors, and a modern dashboard light color, inspired by the latest truck models. Each element is crafted to enhance realism and give the cabin a more dynamic and sleek look.

Features:
– Custom LED headlights for clear, cool lighting
– Enhanced reverse lights with improved color and adjustable intensity
– Dashboard lighting in a refined, modern color

ONLY FOR:
– DAF 2021
– MAN TGX 2020
– SCANIA R 2016
– SCANIA S 2016
– VOLVO FH16 2012

Experience driving in a new light, tailored for select truck models!



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.
